TopicTitle: Known changes to parts coming in V1.0?

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

 I wanted to see if anyone knew what changes Squad where making to parts for v1.0.

 Things like when they changed the size of the SAS wheels that kind of thing. 

Thanks!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T15:04:44Z" title="03/31/2015 03:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by Majorjim**

So far I don't think we've gotten any confirmed changes to existing parts, along those lines. We know that the aerodynamics update will necessitate some changes, but we don't know what changes will be made, precisely.

Oh someone knows for certain, they just aren't spilling the beans. This was a nice subtle way of asking again though.

This is meant as tongue in cheek and I really wish the best to modders with the transition into each update. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Well, we do know that they are doing a whole bunch of balance adjustments to things. Plus, as Necrobones said, the aerodynamics changes will certainly neccesiate some things changing.

Probably everything is going to be changed in at least a small way just to recalibrate for the new aerodynamics and the reentry heat.
We do know one change, the added IVA's.
I thought that they were going to nerf the tiny rocomax engine.

We know:

- There will be a large number of balance changes, some items will get nerfed, some may get buffed. We do not know specifics, though the tiny rockomax has said to be nerfed. However, aero is different so at least in that stage, it is all going to be new.
- All Engines will have a nice name like "Mainsail" in addition to the model numbers. Some have been mentioned, I don't have them off hand.
- IVA's have been added to all those that didn't have them.

Also the addition of scanning and drilling parts and new landing gear and also new wing parts i think.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T20:20:20Z" title="03/31/2015 08:20  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by worir4**
Thanks for all the replies. I am just hoping they don't change any part sizes!
!'d love to see some of the winglets that were hangers-on from the pre-Porkjet era get reworked.
